title: Saturday Special  - Colin speaks with Writer/Producer Brian Koppelman
itunes:title: Saturday Special  - Colin speaks with Writer/Producer Brian Koppelman
description:
Colin talks with Brian Koppelman who not only has written such films as Rounders and Ocean's Thirteen but is also the Creator and Executive Producer of the Showtime series Billions which is Colin's new obsession.  They discuss the creation of the series, what it’s like working with such amazing actors and the difficulties of writing season and eventually series finales.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
